content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I declined to continue the negotiation because the proposed prices were too low for the apartment's location and size.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: We did not reach a final price. The highest proposed price was 850 euros, which I also declined.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, as it is not relevant to the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
